about_the_game:
Overview

Broken Reality 2000 is a single player adventure game set in an ethereal metaverse called NATEM, that is full of quests, puzzles and light platforming. Explore diferent sites, make new friends and collect Likes to raise your popularity and earn access to new areas. Discover a wide set of tools, like a virus-slaying Katana, a net-surfing Hoverboard, a Camera to take beautiful pictures, and more, that will help you explore this colorful world!

We can't wait to tell you more about the game, but first...

A message from the Board of NATEM

Welcome back, user.

We're ecstatic to have you here for the next chapter of the Internet.

NATEM is a metaverse company founded under one sole premise: You are special, more so than anyone else. This is why we, in NATEM, have created a beautiful, expansive world, full of business opportunities, communities, and freedom. Within our guidelines and terms of service.

NATEM's also a place for you to make friends, empower one another, and find your voice to feel validated.

With our upcoming Y2K Update, we're about to welcome the new millennium with style, and take the world by storm while also making it a better place.

Log in now to experience preview features and secure your spot in this new beginning!

Featuring:

  • Full VR Compatibility

  • Interconnected worlds to gradually explore!

  • New hats to express your true self

  • 50% less problematic memes

  • State of the art camera control invertion system

  • 99.99% Softlock free!

  • All bugs have been turned into features

  • Achievement

  • Somewhat cohesive narrative

Don't sleep on this unique opportunity! There is no better time to jump into NATEM and be part of a new, better world. Come join us as we create the best possible version of the future where you can find your voice and connect with likeminded Users.

The future is now, what are you doing about it?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz P4, Dual Core 2.0 (or higher)
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card must be 128 MB or more and with support for Pixel Shader 2.0b (ATI Radeon X800 or higher / NVIDIA GeForce 7600 or higher / Intel HD Graphics 2000 or higher).
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
